scripts.precommit: gulp build && npm run index && git add .
scripts.list-songs: node -p "const fs = require('fs'); const folders = fs.readdirSync('raw').reduce((listing, folder) => listing.concat(fs.readdirSync('raw/' + folder)), []).map(name => name.replace(/(?:\d+\. |\.ditty)/g, '')); JSON.stringify(folders)"
scripts.index: npm run --silent list-songs | doxie --render --inject into index.html
